snippet: Happy Women's History Month! This week's Poetry Pairing matches Lady Mary Chudleigh's 17th-century poem "To the Ladies" with a 21st-century Opinion piece about marriage and the role of women by Stephanie Coontz.
abstract: Happy Women's History Month! This week's Poetry Pairing matches Lady Mary Chudleigh's 17th-century poem "To the Ladies" with a 21st-century Opinion piece about marriage and the role of women by Stephanie Coontz.
